description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission Ref P/2013/4443 dated 29/11/13 for: removal of temporary building to rear and canteen block to South, erection of two storey extension to southside with canopies to East and South to provide hall, kitchen, classrooms for nursery, reception, years 5 & 6 pupils, staff room and other accommodation, erection of bin store to front, bicycle store in South East corner, two detached canopies and provision of hard play areas including multi use games area, landscaping, rearrangement of car parking (17 spaces including 1 disabled) and provision of 2 new and one altered pedestrian access (Deemed Consent). The non-material amendment is to change the material of the canopies from perspex to clear glass, increase the height of the parapets and alter the fenestration on the west elevation and north elevation facing the new building
